lines.gurmukhi: Cib kY Anyk Cb soBw kY Anyk soBw; joiq kY Anyk joiq nmo nmo nm hY [

Unknown.translation: Myriad beauties and many praises salute the beauty and praise of divine effulgence of the True Guru.

lines.gurmukhi: ausquiq aupmw mhwqm mihmw Anyk; eyk iql kQw Aiq Agm Agm hY [

Unknown.translation: Praise of the True Guru equal to a sesame seed is beyond many praises, comparisons, and glories described.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: AYsw hI ausqiq aupmw mhwqm mihmw Anyk ausqqIAwˆ aupmwˆ mhwqm qIrQ prb Awid dy syvn dy vw puMn krmwˆ dy krn dy Aru mihmw sB pRkwr dI SuB kIrqI Anykwˆ Anykwˆ hI iek`TIAwˆ ho AOx, qwˆ BI BI eyk iql kQw Aiq Agm Agm hY Es iek iql dI kQw Aiq sY kr ky AgMm hI AgMm sB pRkwr kr ky hI phuMc, pujq qoˆ pwr rihMdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: buiD bl bcn ibbyk jau Anyk imly; eyk iql Awid ibsmwid kY ibsm hY [

Unknown.translation: If all the wisdom, strength, powers of speech, and worldly knowledge combine, these would be astonished by a momentary initial glimpse of the True Guru.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ie\y hI buiD bl bcn ibbyk dw bl vÎwKÎw SkqI qQw ibbyk bl soc vIcwr dw mwdw BI jykr Anykwˆ rUp ho Awx imln qwˆ BI eyk iql Awid ibsmwid kY ibsm hY ijs AvsQw qoˆ Es nUM BI ibsm hY BOck ivc pw id`qw krdy hn Bwv hrwnI dIAwˆ h`dwˆ hI t`p jwXw krdy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: eyk iql kY Anyk BwNiq inhkwNiq BeI; Aibgiq giq gur pUrn bRhm hY [141[

Unknown.translation: All the beauties become insipid and fade away before a momentary glimpse of the divine light of the True Guru. Therefore grandeur of complete God like True Guru is beyond apprehension. (141)
